resources.string: SELECT CompParams.Name, CompParamTypes.Name, CompParams.Id, CompParams.DefaultValue FROM CompParams INNER JOIN Computations ON CompParams.ComputationId = Computations.Id INNER JOIN CompParamTypes ON CompParamTypes.Id = CompParams.TypeId WHERE Computations.Name = ?
SELECT ComputationTypes.Name FROM Computations INNER JOIN ComputationTypes ON ComputationTypes.Id = Computations.TypeId WHERE Computations.Name = ?
